EmailTemplate.name: Ambassador Lead Market Automation
EmailTemplate.subject: As an ambassador you can earn $0 to $10,000 per month
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Palmetto’s Ambassador program! We’re excited that you’re a lover of solar too. Please schedule an appointment and we will contact you!
https://calendly.com/bennett-barton/alchemist
Thank you,
The Palmetto Team
